txt.en:
'Many guards patrol the bridges of Fushaum Bal. It is unfortunate that most have been claimed by our enemies.

'If you kill these guards for us, we may claim the bridges.'

You decide to defeat the guards to please M창latuk.
Khirgi's Bridge Guards can be found in Fushaum Bal North.\n\nYou should defeat the men guarding the bridge to Fushaum Bal North.
M창latuk can be found at Fushaum Bal South.\n\nYou should talk to M창latuk.
The encampment of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil men once under the command of Sauron.
